Fire Protection District No. 5 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 5 Proposition 
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 5, State of Louisiana, (the "District"), continue to levy a ten (10) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $88,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities, purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment, and paying the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and services, and for the added purposes of purchase of real estate, buildings, and/or construction of a fire station or fire stations for Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 5, State of Louisiana, said special tax renewal shall be subject to homestead exemption?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 6 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 6 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 6, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $135,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2023 and ending with the year 2032, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities, for purchasing fire trucks and other fire fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 7 -- 13.0 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 7 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 7, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to renew a special ad valorem tax of thirteen (13.0) mills tax on all property subject to taxation within the boundaries of the District (the "Tax") (an estimated $374,000 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for the entire year), beginning with the year 2023, and annually thereafter, to and including the year 2032, and shall the proceeds of said Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) be used by the District to acquire, construct, improve, maintain and/or operate facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical services in and for the Washington Parish Fire Protection District No. 7, including the purchase of fire trucks and other fire fighting and emergency equipment, and to pay the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including hydrant rentals and service?
